game.name: Chicken Labyrinth Puzzles
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Guide the lost chicken through mazes and solve puzzles to get home.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Guide the lost chicken through mazes and solve puzzles to get home.

reviewHighlights.text: A puzzle game in which you walk through subsequent mazes as a chicken and solve simple puzzles ✅Cool surroundings (bird singing without soundtrack) ✅Y...
A light and casual puzzle game that is easy to pick up. The mazes are fun and occasionally tricky, making you think about each move. Simple, relaxing,...
